achievement.desc: Engage King Dred in Drak'Tharon Keep on Heroic Difficulty and slay 6 Drakkari Gutrippers or Drakkari Scytheclaw during his defeat.

achievement.title: Abuse the Ooze

achievement.desc: Defeat the Tribunal of Ages encounter in the Halls of Stone on Heroic Difficulty without allowing Brann Bronzebeard to take any damage.
achievement.title: Brann Spankin' New

achievement.desc: Defeat the Maiden of Grief in the Halls of Stone on Heroic Difficulty in 1 minute or less.
achievement.title: Good Grief

achievement.desc: Defeat Slad'ran in Gundrak on Heroic Difficulty without getting snake wrapped.
achievement.title: Snakes. Why'd It Have To Be Snakes?

achievement.desc: Defeat Zuramat the Obliterator in The Violet Hold on Heroic Difficulty without killing any void sentries.
achievement.title: A Void Dance

achievement.desc: Defeat Prince Taldaram in Ahn'kahet on Heroic Difficulty with less than 5 people.
achievement.title: The Party's Over

achievement.desc: Defeat the Gundrak bosses on Heroic Difficulty.
achievement.title: Heroic: Gundrak

achievement.desc: Defeat Gal'darah in Gundrak on Heroic Difficulty while under the effects of Eck Residue.
achievement.title: What the Eck?

achievement.desc: Defeat Jedoga Shadowseeker in Ahn'kahet on Heroic Difficulty without killing any Twilight Volunteers.
achievement.title: Volunteer Work

achievement.desc: Defeat the Azjol-Nerub bosses on Heroic Difficulty.
achievement.title: Heroic: Azjol-Nerub

achievement.desc: Defeat King Ymiron in Utgarde Pinnacle on Heroic Difficulty without anyone in the party triggering Bane.
achievement.title: King's Bane

achievement.desc: Defeat Skadi the Ruthless in Utgarde Pinnacle on Heroic Difficulty within 3 minutes of starting the gauntlet event.
achievement.title: Lodi Dodi We Loves the Skadi

achievement.desc: Defeat Skadi the Ruthless in Utgarde Pinnacle on Heroic Difficulty after having killed Grauf from 100% to dead in a single pass.
achievement.title: My Girl Loves to Skadi All the Time

achievement.desc: Force Svala Sorrowgrave to kill a Scourge Hulk on Heroic Difficulty in Utgarde Pinnacle.
achievement.title: The Incredible Hulk

achievement.desc: Defeat Prince Keleseth in Utgarde Keep on Heroic Difficulty without shattering any Frost Tombs.
achievement.title: On The Rocks

achievement.desc: Defeat the Ahn'kahet: The Old Kingdom bosses on Heroic Difficulty.
achievement.title: Heroic: Ahn'kahet: The Old Kingdom

achievement.desc: On three different visits to The Oculus, get credit for defeating Ley-Guardian Eregos while riding an Amber, Emerald, and Ruby drake on Heroic Difficulty.
achievement.title: Experienced Drake Rider

achievement.desc: Defeat The Nexus bosses on Heroic Difficulty.
achievement.title: Heroic: The Nexus

achievement.desc: Defeat Keristrasza in The Nexus on Heroic Difficulty without allowing Intense Cold to reach more than two stacks.
achievement.title: Intense Cold

achievement.desc: Defeat Cyanigosa in The Violet Hold on Heroic Difficulty.
achievement.title: Heroic: The Violet Hold

achievement.desc: Defeat Cyanigosa in The Violet Hold without using Defense Control Crystals and with Prison Seal Integrity at 100% while in Heroic Difficulty.
achievement.title: Defenseless

achievement.desc: Defeat the Utgarde Pinnacle bosses on Heroic Difficulty.
achievement.title: Heroic: Utgarde Pinnacle

achievement.desc: Defeat the Drak'Tharon Keep bosses on Heroic Difficulty.
achievement.title: Heroic: Drak'Tharon Keep

achievement.title: Heroic: The Oculus

achievement.desc: Defeat the Halls of Lightning bosses on Heroic Difficulty.
achievement.title: Heroic: Halls of Lightning

achievement.desc: Defeat Loken in the Halls of Lightning on Heroic Difficulty in 2 minutes or less.
achievement.title: Timely Death

achievement.desc: Defeat Volkhan in the Halls of Lightning on Heroic Difficulty without allowing him to shatter more than 4 Brittle Golems.
achievement.title: Shatter Resistant

achievement.desc: Defeat General Bjarngrim in the Halls of Lightning on Heroic Difficulty while he has a Temporary Electrical Charge.
achievement.title: Lightning Struck

achievement.desc: Defeat the Utgarde Keep bosses on Heroic Difficulty.
achievement.title: Heroic: Utgarde Keep

achievement.desc: Defeat Grand Magus Telestra in The Nexus on Heroic Difficulty after having killed her images within 5 seconds of each other during both splits.
achievement.title: Split Personality

achievement.desc: Defeat Anomalus in The Nexus on Heroic Difficulty without destroying any Chaotic Rifts.
achievement.title: Chaos Theory

achievement.desc: Defeat Krik'thir the Gatewatcher in Azjol-Nerub on Heroic Difficulty while Watcher Gashra, Watcher Narji, and Watcher Silthik are still alive.
achievement.title: Watch Him Die

achievement.desc: Defeat Hadronox in Azjol-Nerub on Heroic Difficulty before he webs the top doors and prevents more creatures from spawning.
achievement.title: Hadronox Denied

achievement.desc: Defeat Herald Volazj in Ahn'kahet on Heroic Difficulty in 2 minutes or less.
achievement.title: Volazj's Quick Demise

achievement.desc: Defeat Elder Nadox in Ahn'kahet on Heroic Difficulty without killing any Ahn'kahar Guardians.
achievement.title: Respect Your Elders

achievement.desc: Defeat Trollgore in Drak'Tharon Keep on Heroic Difficulty before Consume reaches ten stacks.
achievement.title: Consumption Junction

achievement.desc: Defeat Novos the Summoner in Drak'Tharon Keep on Heroic Difficulty without allowing any undead minions to reach the floor.
achievement.title: Oh Novos!

achievement.desc: Defeat Ichoron in the Violet Hold on Heroic Difficulty without allowing any Ichor Globules to merge.
achievement.title: Dehydration

achievement.desc: Defeat Gal'darah in Gundrak on Heroic Difficulty and have 5 unique party members get impaled throughout the fight.
achievement.title: Share The Love

achievement.desc: Defeat Moorabi in Gundrak on Heroic Difficulty while preventing him from transforming into a mammoth at any point during the encounter.
achievement.title: Less-rabi

achievement.desc: Defeat the Infinite Corruptor in The Culling of Stratholme on Heroic Difficulty.
achievement.title: The Culling of Time

achievement.desc: Kill 100 Risen Zombies in 1 minute in The Culling of Stratholme on Heroic Difficulty.
achievement.title: Zombiefest!

achievement.desc: Defeat Ley-Guardian Eregos in The Oculus on Heroic Difficulty within 20 minutes of Drakos the Interrogator's death.
achievement.title: Make It Count

achievement.desc: Defeat Ley-Guardian Eregos in The Oculus on Heroic Difficulty without anyone in your party using a Ruby Drake.
achievement.title: Ruby Void

achievement.desc: Defeat Ley-Guardian Eregos in The Oculus on Heroic Difficulty without anyone in your party using an Emerald Drake.
achievement.title: Emerald Void

achievement.desc: Defeat Ley-Guardian Eregos in The Oculus on Heroic Difficulty without anyone in your party using an Amber Drake.
achievement.title: Amber Void

achievement.desc: Defeat Malygos in 6 minutes or less on Normal Difficulty.
achievement.title: You Don't Have An Eternity

achievement.desc: Defeat Sartharion the Onyx Guardian on Normal Difficulty without getting hit by Lava Strike.
achievement.title: Gonna Go When the Volcano Blows

achievement.desc: Defeat Malygos with fewer than 9 on Normal Difficulty.
achievement.title: A Poke In The Eye

achievement.desc: Within one raid lockout period, defeat every boss in Naxxramas on Normal Difficulty without allowing any raid member to die during any of the boss encounters.
achievement.title: The Undying

achievement.desc: Deliver a killing blow to a Scion of Eternity while riding on a hover disk on Normal Difficulty.
achievement.title: Denyin' the Scion

achievement.desc: Defeat the 4 Horsemen in Naxxramas on Normal Difficulty, ensuring that they all die within 15 seconds of each other.
achievement.title: And They Would All Go Down Together

achievement.desc: Defeat Patchwerk in Naxxramas on Normal Difficulty in 3 minutes or less.
achievement.title: Make Quick Werk Of Him

achievement.desc: With at least one Twilight Drake still alive, engage and defeat Sartharion the Onyx Guardian on Normal Difficulty.
achievement.title: Twilight Assist

achievement.desc: With at least two Twilight Drakes still alive, engage and defeat Sartharion the Onyx Guardian on Normal Difficulty.
achievement.title: Twilight Duo

achievement.desc: With all three Twilight Drakes still alive, engage and defeat Sartharion the Onyx Guardian on Normal Difficulty.
achievement.title: The Twilight Zone

achievement.desc: Defeat the bosses of Naxxramas on Normal Difficulty with less than 9 people in the zone.
achievement.title: The Dedicated Few

achievement.desc: Defeat Kel'Thuzad on Normal Difficulty in Naxxramas while killing at least 18 abominations in his chamber.
achievement.title: Just Can't Get Enough

achievement.desc: Defeat Sapphiron on Normal Difficulty in Naxxramas without any member of the raid having a frost resist value over 100.
achievement.title: The Hundred Club

achievement.desc: Defeat Thaddius in Naxxramas on Normal Difficulty without anyone in the raid crossing the negative and positive charges.
achievement.title: Shocking!

achievement.desc: Defeat Thaddius in Naxxramas on Normal Difficulty with less than 9 people.
achievement.title: Subtraction

achievement.desc: Defeat Grand Widow Faerlina in Naxxramas on Normal Difficulty without dispelling or preventing frenzy.
achievement.title: Momma Said Knock You Out

achievement.desc: Defeat Malygos on Normal Difficulty.
achievement.title: The Spellweaver's Downfall

achievement.desc: Defeat Kel'Thuzad on Normal Difficulty in Naxxramas.
achievement.title: Kel'Thuzad's Defeat

achievement.desc: Defeat every boss in Naxxramas on Normal Difficulty.
achievement.title: The Fall of Naxxramas

achievement.desc: Defeat Sapphiron on Normal Difficulty in Naxxramas.
achievement.title: Sapphiron's Demise

achievement.desc: Defeat the bosses of The Military Quarter of Naxxramas on Normal Difficulty.
achievement.title: The Military Quarter

achievement.desc: Defeat the bosses of The Construct Quarter of Naxxramas on Normal Difficulty.
achievement.title: The Construct Quarter

achievement.desc: Defeat Heigan the Unclean in Naxxramas on Normal Difficulty without anyone in the raid dying.
achievement.title: The Safety Dance

achievement.desc: Defeat Maexxna in Naxxramas within 20 minutes of Anub'Rekhan's death on Normal Difficulty.
achievement.title: Arachnophobia

achievement.desc: Defeat Sartharion the Onyx Guardian on Normal Difficulty.
achievement.title: Besting the Black Dragonflight

achievement.desc: Defeat the bosses of The Arachnid Quarter of Naxxramas on Normal Difficulty.
achievement.title: The Arachnid Quarter

achievement.desc: Defeat the bosses of The Plague Quarter of Naxxramas on Normal Difficulty.
achievement.title: The Plague Quarter

achievement.desc: Defeat Sartharion the Onyx Guardian and the Twilight Drakes with fewer than 9 on Normal Difficulty.
achievement.title: Less Is More

achievement.desc: Defeat Loatheb in Naxxramas on Normal Difficulty without killing any spores.
achievement.title: Spore Loser

achievement.desc: Defeat Loatheb in Naxxramas on Heroic Difficulty without killing any spores.
achievement.title: Heroic: Spore Loser

achievement.desc: Kill Patchwerk in Naxxramas in 3 minutes or less on Heroic Difficulty.
achievement.title: Heroic: Make Quick Werk Of Him

achievement.desc: Defeat Malygos on Heroic Difficulty with fewer than 21.
achievement.title: Heroic: A Poke In The Eye

achievement.desc: Deliver a killing blow to a Scion of Eternity while riding on a hover disk on Heroic Difficulty.
achievement.title: Heroic: Denyin' the Scion

achievement.desc: Defeat the bosses of Naxxramas with less than 21 people in the zone on Heroic Difficulty.
achievement.title: Heroic: The Dedicated Few

achievement.desc: Defeat Thaddius in Naxxramas on Heroic Difficulty with less than 21 people.
achievement.title: Heroic: Subtraction

achievement.desc: Defeat Sartharion the Onyx Guardian on Heroic Difficulty without getting hit by Lava Strike.

achievement.desc: Defeat Sartharion the Onyx Guardian and the Twilight Drakes on Heroic Difficulty with fewer than 21.
achievement.title: Heroic: Less Is More

achievement.desc: Defeat Malygos in 6 minutes or less on Heroic Difficulty.
achievement.title: Heroic: You Don't Have An Eternity

achievement.desc: Within one raid lockout period, defeat every boss in Naxxramas on Heroic Difficulty without allowing any raid member to die during any of the boss encounters.
achievement.title: The Immortal

achievement.desc: Defeat Grand Widow Faerlina in Naxxramas on Heroic Difficulty without dispelling or preventing frenzy.
achievement.title: Heroic: Momma Said Knock You Out

achievement.desc: With all three Twilight Drakes still alive, engage and defeat Sartharion the Onyx Guardian on Heroic Difficulty.
achievement.title: Heroic: The Twilight Zone

achievement.desc: Defeat Kel'Thuzad on Heroic Difficulty in Naxxramas while killing at least 18 abominations in his chamber.
achievement.title: Heroic: Just Can't Get Enough

achievement.desc: Defeat Sapphiron on Heroic Difficulty in Naxxramas without any member of the raid having a frost resist value over 100.
achievement.title: Heroic: The Hundred Club

achievement.desc: Defeat the 4 Horsemen in Naxxramas on Heroic Difficulty, ensuring that they all die within 15 seconds of each other.
achievement.title: Heroic: And They Would All Go Down Together

achievement.desc: Kill Maexxna in Naxxramas within 20 minutes of Anub'Rekhan's death on Heroic Difficulty.
achievement.title: Heroic: Arachnophobia

achievement.desc: With at least one Twilight Drake still alive, engage and defeat Sartharion the Onyx Guardian on Heroic Difficulty.
achievement.title: Heroic: Twilight Assist

achievement.desc: With at least two Twilight Drakes still alive, engage and defeat Sartharion the Onyx Guardian on Heroic Difficulty.
achievement.title: Heroic: Twilight Duo

achievement.desc: Defeat Malygos on Heroic Difficulty.
achievement.title: Heroic: The Spellweaver's Downfall

achievement.desc: Defeat Kel'Thuzad on Heroic Difficulty in Naxxramas.
achievement.title: Heroic: Kel'Thuzad's Defeat

achievement.desc: Defeat every boss in Naxxramas on Heroic Difficulty.
achievement.title: Heroic: The Fall of Naxxramas

achievement.desc: Defeat Sapphiron on Heroic Difficulty in Naxxramas.
achievement.title: Heroic: Sapphiron's Demise

achievement.desc: Defeat the bosses of The Construct Quarter of Naxxramas on Heroic Difficulty.
achievement.title: Heroic: The Construct Quarter

achievement.desc: Defeat Thaddius in Naxxramas on Heroic Difficulty without anyone in the raid crossing the negative and positive charges.
achievement.title: Heroic: Shocking!

achievement.desc: Defeat the bosses of The Military Quarter of Naxxramas on Heroic Difficulty.
achievement.title: Heroic: The Military Quarter

achievement.desc: Defeat the bosses of The Plague Quarter of Naxxramas on Heroic Difficulty.
achievement.title: Heroic: The Plague Quarter

achievement.desc: Defeat Heigan the Unclean in Naxxramas on Heroic Difficulty without anyone in the raid dying.
achievement.title: Heroic: The Safety Dance

achievement.desc: Defeat the bosses of The Arachnid Quarter of Naxxramas on Heroic Difficulty.
achievement.title: Heroic: The Arachnid Quarter

achievement.desc: Defeat Sartharion the Onyx Guardian on Heroic Difficulty.
achievement.title: Heroic: Besting the Black Dragonflight

achievement.desc: Defeat the bosses of The Siege area of Ulduar on Normal Difficulty.
achievement.title: The Siege of Ulduar

achievement.desc: Defeat the bosses of The Antechamber area of Ulduar on Normal Difficulty.
achievement.title: The Antechamber of Ulduar

achievement.desc: Defeat the Keeper bosses of Ulduar on Normal Difficulty.
achievement.title: The Keepers of Ulduar

achievement.desc: Defeat the bosses of The Descent into Madness area of Ulduar on Normal Difficulty.
achievement.title: The Descent into Madness

achievement.desc: Defeat every boss in Ulduar on Normal Difficulty.
achievement.title: The Secrets of Ulduar

achievement.desc: Destroy 100 Steelforged Defenders in 10 seconds on the Ulduar gauntlet on Normal Difficulty.
achievement.title: Dwarfageddon

achievement.desc: Defeat Flame Leviathan on the first try without anyone repairing their vehicle on Normal Difficulty.
achievement.title: Unbroken

achievement.desc: Defeat Flame Leviathan while in each of the following vehicles on Normal Difficulty.
achievement.title: Three Car Garage

achievement.desc: Destroy a Flame Leviathan Defense Turret on Normal Difficulty.
achievement.title: Take Out Those Turrets

achievement.desc: Defeat Flame Leviathan without causing a System Shutdown on Normal Difficulty.
achievement.title: Shutout

achievement.desc: Defeat Flame Leviathan with at least 1 Orbital Defense System active on Normal Difficulty.
achievement.title: Orbital Bombardment

achievement.desc: Defeat Razorscale without allowing her to fly into the air more than once on Normal Difficulty.
achievement.title: A Quick Shave

achievement.desc: Defeat 25 Dark Rune Guardian Dwarves with Razorscale's Flame Breath on Normal Difficulty.
achievement.title: Iron Dwarf, Medium Rare

achievement.desc: Defeat Ignis the Furnace Master after shattering 2 Iron Constructs within 5 seconds on Normal Difficulty.
achievement.title: Shattered

achievement.desc: Survive being thrown into Ignis the Furnace Master's Slag Pot on Normal Difficulty.
achievement.title: Hot Pocket

achievement.desc: Defeat Ignis the Furnace Master in 4 minutes on Normal Difficulty.
achievement.title: Stokin' the Furnace

achievement.desc: Defeat XT-002 Deconstructor without him recovering any health from XS-013 Scrapbots on Normal Difficulty.
achievement.title: Nerf Engineering

achievement.desc: Defeat 20 XS-013 Scrapbots within 12 seconds using XE-321 Boombots on Normal Difficulty.
achievement.title: Nerf Scrapbots

achievement.desc: Defeat XT-002 Deconstructor without any raid member dying from a Gravity Bomb on Normal Difficulty.
achievement.title: Nerf Gravity Bombs

achievement.desc: Defeat XT-002 Deconstructor in 205 seconds on Normal Difficulty.
achievement.title: Must Deconstruct Faster

achievement.desc: Defeat XT-002 Deconstructor after destroying his heart on Normal Difficulty.
achievement.title: Heartbreaker

achievement.desc: Defeat the Assembly of Iron with Runemaster Molgeim as the last member alive on Normal Difficulty.
achievement.title: I Choose You, Runemaster Molgeim

achievement.desc: Defeat the Assembly of Iron with Stormcaller Brundir as the last member alive on Normal Difficulty.
achievement.title: I Choose You, Stormcaller Brundir

achievement.desc: Defeat the Assembly of Iron with Steelbreaker as the last member alive on Normal Difficulty.
achievement.title: I Choose You, Steelbreaker

achievement.desc: Defeat the Assembly of Iron while under the effect of an Iron Boot Flask on Normal Difficulty.
achievement.title: But I'm on Your Side

achievement.desc: Defeat the Assembly of Iron without allowing Stormcaller Brundir to damage anyone with Chain Lightning or Lightning Whirl on Normal Difficulty.
achievement.title: Can't Do That While Stunned

achievement.desc: Defeat Kologarn without destroying either of his arms on Normal Difficulty.
achievement.title: With Open Arms

achievement.desc: Destroy both of Kologarn's arms within 12 seconds and then defeat Kologarn on Normal Difficulty.
achievement.title: Disarmed

achievement.desc: Defeat Kologarn without any raid member being hit by Focused Eyebeams on Normal Difficulty.
achievement.title: If Looks Could Kill

achievement.desc: Defeat Kologarn with 25 Rubble creatures alive on Normal Difficulty.
achievement.title: Rubble and Roll

achievement.desc: Defeat Auriaya without destroying her Sanctum Sentries on Normal Difficulty.
achievement.title: Crazy Cat Lady

achievement.desc: Defeat the Feral Defender while defeating Auriaya on Normal Difficulty.
achievement.title: Nine Lives

achievement.desc: Defeat Hodir without any raid member being hit by Flash Freeze on Normal Difficulty.
achievement.title: Cheese the Freeze

achievement.desc: Defeat Hodir without any friendly NPC dying on Normal Difficulty.
achievement.title: I Have the Coolest Friends

achievement.desc: Defeat Hodir without any raid member having more than 2 stacks of Biting Cold on Normal Difficulty.
achievement.title: Getting Cold in Here

achievement.desc: Defeat Hodir before he shatters his rare cache on Normal Difficulty.
achievement.title: I Could Say That This Cache Was Rare

achievement.desc: Possess the effects of Toasty Fire, Storm Power and Starlight at the same time on Normal Difficulty.
achievement.title: Staying Buffed All Winter

achievement.desc: Defeat Thorim without any raid member being struck by Lightning Charge on Normal Difficulty.
achievement.title: Don't Stand in the Lightning

achievement.desc: Defeat Thorim, the Ancient Rune Giant and the Rune Colossus on Normal Difficulty.
achievement.title: I'll Take You All On

criteria.name: Participate in slaying Ancient Rune Giant

achievement.desc: Defeat Thorim while under the effect of Aura of Celerity on Normal Difficulty.
achievement.title: Who Needs Bloodlust?

achievement.desc: Force Thorim to enter the arena while Sif is present on Normal Difficulty.
achievement.title: Siffed

achievement.desc: Defeat Elder Brightleaf, Elder Ironbranch and Elder Stonebark within 15 seconds of each other on Normal Difficulty.
achievement.title: Lumberjacked

achievement.desc: Defeat Freya within 20 minutes of the first creature you kill in the Conservatory of Life on Normal Difficulty.
achievement.title: Con-speed-atory

achievement.desc: Defeat 2 Ancient Water Spirits, 2 Storm Lashers and 2 Snaplashers within 10 seconds on Normal Difficulty.
achievement.title: Deforestation

achievement.desc: Defeat Freya while she is affected by 25 stacks of Attuned to Nature on Normal Difficulty.
achievement.title: Getting Back to Nature

achievement.desc: Defeat Freya while leaving at least 1 Elder alive on Normal Difficulty.
achievement.title: Knock on Wood

achievement.desc: Defeat Mimiron without anyone in the raid being hit by the following on Normal Difficulty.
achievement.title: Set Up Us the Bomb

achievement.desc: Force Mimiron to kill an Assault Bot with a Rocket Strike on Normal Difficulty.
achievement.title: Not-So-Friendly Fire

achievement.desc: Defeat Mimiron after activating his Self-Destruct mechanism on Normal Difficulty.
achievement.title: Firefighter

achievement.desc: Defeat General Vezax without any raid member being hit by Shadow Crash on Normal Difficulty.
achievement.title: Shadowdodger

achievement.desc: Defeat General Vezax after defeating the Saronite Animus on Normal Difficulty.
achievement.title: I Love the Smell of Saronite in the Morning

achievement.desc: /Kiss Sara in Ulduar while she is angry with you on Normal Difficulty.
achievement.title: Kiss and Make Up

achievement.desc: Defeat Yogg-Saron with the assistance of three or fewer Keepers on Normal Difficulty.
achievement.title: Three Lights in the Darkness

achievement.desc: Defeat Yogg-Saron without any raid member going insane on Normal Difficulty.
achievement.title: Drive Me Crazy

achievement.desc: Defeat Yogg-Saron within 7 minutes on Normal Difficulty.
achievement.title: He's Not Getting Any Older

achievement.desc: Defeat 9 Guardians of Yogg-Saron within 12 seconds on Normal Difficulty.
achievement.title: They're Coming Out of the Walls

achievement.desc: Experience all 3 visions of Yogg-Saron's mind on Normal Difficulty.
achievement.title: In His House He Waits Dreaming

criteria.name: The Forging of the Demon Soul

achievement.desc: Defeat Algalon the Observer on Normal Difficulty.
achievement.title: Observed

achievement.desc: Defeat Algalon the Observer while closing 3 Black Holes within 10 seconds on Normal Difficulty.
achievement.title: Supermassive

achievement.desc: Defeat Algalon the Observer on Normal Difficulty without any raid member dying to Algalon at any point during that raid lockout period.
achievement.title: He Feeds On Your Tears

achievement.desc: Defeat Algalon the Observer on Normal Difficulty without anyone in the raid wearing any equipment with an item level higher than 226.
achievement.reward: Title Reward: Herald of the Titans
achievement.title: Herald of the Titans

achievement.desc: Defeat each boss in Ulduar on Normal Difficulty without allowing any raid member to die to that boss at any point during that raid lockout period.
achievement.title: Champion of Ulduar

achievement.title: Heroic: The Siege of Ulduar
